( #{item.crewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.crewMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.passwordMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastOfflineTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update CREW set
crewName = #{crewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phoneNum = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update.foreach:
update CREW set
crewName = #{item.crewName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phoneNum = #{item.phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{item.mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crewMessage = #{item.crewMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
